label: Official Title
desc: Title of the news item according to the official media sources

label: Official Headline
desc: Headline of the news item according to the official media sources

label: News Outlet
desc: Original news outlet that published the news item

label: Query Topic
desc: Query topic used to obtain the items in the official media sources

label: Publication Date
desc: Date and time of the news items' publication

label: Facebook Popularity
desc: Final value of the news items' popularity according to the social media source Facebook

label: Google+ Popularity
desc: Final value of the news items' popularity according to the social media source Google+

label: LinkedIn Popularity
desc: Final value of the news items' popularity according to the social media source LinkedIn

label: Title Sentiment
desc: Sentiment score of the title, Higher the score, better is the impact or +ve sentiment and vice-versa. (Target Variable 1)

label: Headline Sentiment
desc: Sentiment score of the text in the news items' headline. Higher the score, better is the impact or +ve sentiment. (Target Variable 2)
